articles.title: The problems with building "micro cars" in the U.S. - Axios

articles.title: SpaceX to Offer Insider Shares at Record-Setting Valuation - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: SpaceX is preparing to sell insider shares in a transaction that would value Elon Musk’s rocket and satellite maker at a valuation higher than OpenAI’s record-setting $500 billion, people familiar with the matter said.

articles.title: Carvana, CRH, Comfort Systems to join S&P 500 in rebalancing - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: The companies will join the benchmark in a quarterly rebalance at the end of December, S&P Dow Jones Indices said Friday.

articles.title: Waymo to issue software recall over how robotaxis behave around school buses - TechCrunch
articles.description: The voluntary recall comes as scrutiny by federal regulators and local school district officials increases.

articles.title: US Stocks Hold Onto Gains as Fed Countdown Begins: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The stock market crept higher, but stopped short of records Friday, as traders refrained from making big bets ahead of the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut decision next week. Treasuries notched their worst week since June.

articles.title: FDA instability, alarm over agency’s direction escalate after top regulator exits - The Washington Post
articles.description: As leadership churn continues, FDA’s unpredictability rattles companies relying on stable regulation.

articles.title: ‘An attack on all American tech platforms’: Trump admin decries EU fine on Musk’s X - Politico
articles.description: The move adds another layer of tension to the EU’s strained relationship with Trump, as he’s threatened to impose additional tariffs on the EU if it continues to lob fines at American tech giants.

articles.title: Woman Hailed as Hero for Smashing Man’s Meta Smart Glasses on Subway - Futurism
articles.description: A New York subway rider has accused a woman of breaking his Meta smart glasses. She was later hailed as a hero.

articles.title: Railroads will be allowed to reduce inspections and rely more on technology to spot track problems - AP News

articles.description: Yields were higher by four basis points early afternoon in New York, with the 30-year bond’s reaching 4.80%, last seen in late September.  Fed policymakers...

articles.title: US Oil Rig Count Stages A Comeback After Last Week's Losses - Crude Oil Prices Today | OilPrice.com
articles.description: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States rose this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday, after last week's sharp decline.

articles.title: David Ellison's hunt for WBD made David Zaslav richer — and it may not be over - CNBC
articles.description: Paramount is considering taking an offer to WBD shareholders, thinking its deal has a better chance of gaining regulatory approval than Netflix's, sources said.

articles.title: Energy storage industry set aggressive goals for 2025 — and already crushed them - TechCrunch
articles.description: The battery storage industry in the U.S. has grown in leaps and bounds in recent years, surpassing its most aggressive targets to become one of the largest new sources of power on the grid.
